articles.author: Vatican News
articles.title: Cardinal Parolin: May Europe unite in face of Mediterranean challenges - Vatican News - English
articles.description: Cardinal Secretary of State Pietro Parolin offers Vatican Media his thoughts on the significance of Pope Francis’ visit to Marseille at the conclusion of the "Mediterranean Meetings", calling it an opportunity to promote a spirit of cohesion among European na…
articles.content:
By Massimiliano Menichetti
Europe needs to find a consensus on the New Pact on Migration and Asylum as soon as possible.
The Vatican Secretary of State, Cardinal Pietro Parolin, offered that perspe… [+6187 chars]
